activities: We receive personal information from our users and their company.  The information is used to authenticate and identify unique users within our platform.  The information we receive is limited to the individual's first name, last name, title, company name, email, phone number, and profile image.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The information we receive is limited to the individual's first name, last name, title, company name, email, phone number, and profile image.  This includes any manually processed data.
recoursemech: We use the BBB EU Safe Harbor as our dispute resolution mechanism provider.  This can be accessed directly here: http://www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints.
